title.value: Характеристика среды как фона для отбора при селекции фасоли овощной на стабильную продуктивность
Enviroment characteristic as the background for common bean selection for constant productivity
Enviroment characteristic as the background for common bean selection for constant productivity

journal.title: Vegetable Growing : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Skorina, V.V., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)
Pugachev, R.M., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented data on the results of the test of eleven varieties of common bean (Phaseolus vulgaris) in course of three years in Mogilev region (Belarus). The best varieties by their ecological sustainability were selected. Environment was assessed as background for breeding and seed production. Overall, the environment in Mogilev region in some years may serve as an informational background to detect polymorphism. In the presented study the stabilizing background was formed in both phases of maturity (technical and biological) in years of research. Therefore, seed production requires monitoring of differentiating ability of the medium to determine the possible impact on the environment on varietal seed quality.
